Class ZoomPanGraphMouse

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.PluggableGraphMouse
      edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.ZoomPanGraphMouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, VisualizationViewer.GraphMouse
public class ZoomPanGraphMouse
extends PluggableGraphMouse

ZoomPanGraphMouse is a PluggableGraphMouse class that includes zoom via the mouse wheel, and pan via a mouse drag

Author:
Tom Nelson
